transformations.name: MapDrifted
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	FolderName as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> Raw2DB
Aggregate1 derive(SourceID = 2) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		Platform,
		Manufacturer,
		Model,
		Idiom,
		SourceID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Filter1 aggregate(groupBy(Platform,
		Manufacturer,
		Model,
		Idiom),
	each(match(!in(['Platform','Manufacturer','Model','Idiom'],name)), $$ = first($$))) ~> Aggregate1
Raw2DB derive(FirstOpenDateTime = toString(byName('FirstOpenDateTime')),
		Id = toString(byName('Id')),
		Idiom = toString(byName('Idiom')),
		LastOpenDateTime = toString(byName('LastOpenDateTime')),
		LeadActualFirstDateTimeOpen = toString(byName('LeadActualFirstDateTimeOpen')),
		LeadId = toString(byName('LeadId')),
		Manufacturer = toString(byName('Manufacturer')),
		Model = toString(byName('Model')),
		Name = toString(byName('Name')),
		PNSHandle = toString(byName('PNSHandle')),
		PermissionToSendNotifications = toString(byName('PermissionToSendNotifications')),
		PermissionToSendNotificationsChangedDateTime = toString(byName('PermissionToSendNotificationsChangedDateTime')),
		PermissionToUseGPS = toString(byName('PermissionToUseGPS')),
		PermissionToUseGPSChangedDateTime = toString(byName('PermissionToUseGPSChangedDateTime')),
		Platform = toString(byName('Platform')),
		Type = toString(byName('Type')),
		VersionOfHomeLocatorApp = toString(byName('VersionOfHomeLocatorApp'))) ~> MapDrifted
MapDrifted filter(not(equals(Platform, '0'))) ~> Filter1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Platform,
		Manufacturer,
		Model,
		DeviceType = Idiom,
		SourceID
	)) ~> sink1
